wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: Choose a hand-crafted, made-to-order Burger from our menu. We handsmash all our burgers to lock in flavor, then serve them up on a delicious, toasted brioche bun. Served with fries.
With a more “contemporary” style, our gourmet pizzas are where the creativity of our pizza chefs shines.
For every main dish, there is a perfect side.

wp:term.wp:term_description: With a more "contemporary" style, our gourmet pizzas are where the creativity of our pizza chefs shines. Crafted on our satisfyingly chewy honey-semolina crust, brushed with unique sauces like pesto or gorgonzola cream, then generously topped with premium ingredients like sun-dried tomatoes, smoked gouda, roasted red peppers and more, our gourmet pizzas were created with the connoisseur in mind!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://lafka.althemist.com.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you have an account and you log in to this site, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: About Lafka
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" gap="30" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1623493985912{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

We only use the highest quality ingredients. The result is a taste you can swear by.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Spicy jalapeno bacon ipsum dolor amet jowl brisket burgdoggen, meatball bresaola bacon boudin tri-tip pig pork fatback pork chop prosciutto short ribs pork belly. Ham boudin rump strip steak, porchetta drumstick picanha spare ribs sausage. Tongue ham hock turkey kevin ham short loin tenderloin beef ribs shank turducken chicken. Shankle ham boudin porchetta, corned beef ribeye strip steak pork chop.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="5510" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" gap="30" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1623500260944{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #ffffff url(https://i0.wp.com/lafka.althemist.com/fastfood/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/06/back-romana-white.jpg?id=5420) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="5533" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1623494476361{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

Shankle ham boudin porchetta, corned beef ribeye strip steak pork chop.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" general_row_align="lafka-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1560664739876{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #22272d !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="5528" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="appear"][vc_column_text]

We make real food by hand, fresh to order. It’s not the fastest way – it’s the right way.

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1555580514489{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]Spicy jalapeno bacon ipsum dolor amet jowl brisket burgdoggen, meatball bresaola bacon boudin tri-tip pig pork fatback pork chop prosciutto short ribs pork belly. Ham boudin rump strip steak, porchetta drumstick picanha spare ribs sausage.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2934" img_size="130x60" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1623494752275{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle" gap="30"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Press & Awards

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Spicy jalapeno bacon ipsum dolor amet jowl brisket burgdoggen, meatball bresaola bacon boudin tri-tip pig pork fatback pork chop prosciutto short ribs pork belly. Ham boudin rump strip steak, porchetta drumstick.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="2922" img_size="600x164" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" general_row_align="lafka-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1623492850273{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #fdfaed url(https://i0.wp.com/lafka.althemist.com/fastfood/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/06/back-romana.jpg?id=5405) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][lafka_content_slider no_fill_content_area="1" autoplay="5" navigation="" pagination="yes"][vc_tta_section title="Section 1" tab_id="1555576498319-bf08037f-babd"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="custom" size="lg" align="center" icon_flaticon="flaticon-047-menu" custom_color="#ac8320" css=".vc_custom_1623491809466{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

"The meat comes from butcher Ruby and White’s, the buns are artisan ciabatta, ingredients are locally sourced – no wonder this is the best place to eat burgers in Chicago."

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2914" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1555576939095{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Andrew Robinson

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section 1" tab_id="1555576943335-65fd1b35-dce1"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="custom" size="lg" align="center" icon_flaticon="flaticon-034-waiter" custom_color="#ac8320" css=".vc_custom_1623491826134{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

"The Lafka is, in fact, the burger king when it comes to offering the best food of its kind in Chicago."

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2914" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1555576939095{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Abigail’s Food Blog

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Section 1" tab_id="1555576942515-1eaaf066-ce01"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="custom" size="lg" align="center" icon_flaticon="flaticon-021-fried-chicken" custom_color="#ac8320" css=".vc_custom_1623491838854{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

"I don´t remember a single mouthful I didn’t enjoy. Right now if I go to any other burger place I’ll wish I´d have gone to the Lafka instead."

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="2914" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1555576939095{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Mark Taylor

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/lafka_content_slider][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" allow_overflow="yes" css=".vc_custom_1623075677382{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #fccc4c !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1560841359049{padding-top: 10px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1623075718522{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="custom" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="xl" align="center" icon_flaticon="flaticon-022-serving-dish" custom_color="#95601c" custom_background_color="#fccc4c" css=".vc_custom_1623075783251{margin-top: -40px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1622972489993{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

Love Burgers? Like Deals?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Be the first to know about our newest menu items and latest offers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][mc4wp_form id="2823"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Ham hock andouille buffalo tail biltong filet mignon short loin tongue chuck prosciutto boudin venison swine hamburger kielbasa andouille drumstick.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1549965051283{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="2627" img_size="full" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" onclick="link_image" css=".vc_custom_1555331687627{border-radius: 5px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="2626" img_size="full" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" onclick="link_image" css=".vc_custom_1555331708490{border-radius: 5px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1555329402253{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

So We Took The Challenge...

Leberkas sirloin spare ribs beef kevin. Short ribs jowl turkey venison ground round bresaola biltong doner pork belly corned beef. Beef ribs short loin pastrami tail filet mignon. - Gordon Ramsey
Swine pastrami capicola rump cupim pork loin. Ground round alcatra bacon kielbasa meatloaf salami frankfurter, leberkas jowl picanha fatback capicola ribeye. Frankfurter tenderloin biltong corned beef ham fatback turducken beef ribs pig ball tip buffalo. Andouille jerky tenderloin, porchetta kevin beef alcatra. Ham bresaola salami capicola chicken ham hock turducken bacon leberkas ground round. Tri-tip sausage ribeye flank, picanha pork.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1560612338054{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

The End Result Was Absolutely Amazing

Corned beef jerky salami beef buffalo landjaeger drumstick sausage jowl ribeye prosciutto kevin meatball venison. Tongue beef bresaola salami. Boudin ham hock drumstick filet mignon. Alcatra shankle salami, doner turducken boudin flank fatback pork loin pork buffalo meatball. Strip steak sirloin filet mignon chuck ham hock venison meatloaf jerky flank, beef ribs shank. Short loin ham meatball sausage pork belly. Tongue jowl bacon spare ribs pork loin shoulder sirloin chuck buffalo. Kevin salami meatloaf prosciutto pork loin boudin sausage pork. Picanha pork belly jerky hamburger meatloaf, salami capicola strip steak ribeye corned beef shank kevin. Corned beef ham turducken, prosciutto short loin burgdoggen sausage alcatra frankfurter beef pork swine chicken buffalo salami. Pork loin sirloin pig drumstick.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1560612421932{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Using a custom CNC machine and large PVC sewage pipes, the designer created a range of minimalist chairs for modern spaces. The natural curvature of the pipes provides a comfortable solution for the backrest, while the plywood legs offer perfect support.

The mass-produced pipes are not only durable and designed to last for decades but they’re also accessible and versatile. Environmentally conscious and ingenious, the Pipeline Project aims to explore the potential of sustainable manufacturing.

As the face rotates and the perforated dots reveal the hour indicated by an alignment with the frame, the wearer is able to conceive time as a series of ordered dots, multiplying as the day progresses, and allowing a new perception of time.

A natural choice for those who appreciate slow living just as much as they love minimalism. More importantly, it will become a crucial component to all those moments of relaxation or reflection, accompanied by a cup of hot tea and good conversation.
Well, that's not necessarily true!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: TBH, I don't really get this articles, but what I can tell for sure is that this is probably the best WooCommerce theme for fashion shops. Period.

Hi Martha,
that's OK. No offense taken for the articles. As for the theme, we must agree. It's probably one best WordPress/WooCommerce themes on the market.

Hey guys,
a bit off-topic, but does this theme support product attribute swatches like colors, images and labels?

Actually, it's quite a good question. Yes, the Grosso theme comes with color, image and label swatches for variation attributes, but that's not all. The theme also comes with built-in custom AJAX filters functionality. No plugins needed, no additional costs of any sort.

Hey guys,
nice conversation here. Glad to have you all here.

Proudly Flame-grilling since 1974
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="READ MORE" style="custom" custom_background="#e4584b" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="round" link="url:%23|||" css=".vc_custom_1556110832911{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1556111188716{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background: #dd3333 url(https://i0.wp.com/lafka.althemist.com/fastfood/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2019/04/parallax2.jpg?id=3598);background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1553869337189{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" icon_flaticon="flaticon-010-burger" css=".vc_custom_1556111413912{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}" custom_background_color="#fccc4c"][vc_custom_heading text="BLACK ANGUS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:51|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="BEEF BURGER" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:70|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1556111294684{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]
Flame-grilling gives Lafka’s burgers their irresistible smoky, BBQ flavour. The smoky flavour you just can’t get from pan-frying. It’s not the same without the flame.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="ORDER NOW" style="custom" custom_background="#e4584b" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="round" link="url:%2Ffastfood%2Fproduct-category%2Fburgers%2F|||" css=".vc_custom_1556010707952{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1556112795782{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background: #afce40 url(https://i0.wp.com/lafka.althemist.com/fastfood/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2019/04/parallax3.jpg?id=3609);background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1553869337189{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" icon_flaticon="flaticon-022-serving-dish" css=".vc_custom_1556111525403{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}" custom_background_color="#fccc4c"][vc_custom_heading text="THE FAMOUS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:51|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="MUNCH BOX" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:70|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1556112487667{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]
Lafka delivers the quality, taste and innovation that American burger lovers want. Our unique menu includes 100% Angus Burgers, Crispy Chicken Tenders and Hand-Scooped Ice Cream Shakes!
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="ORDER NOW" style="custom" custom_background="#e4584b" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="round" link="url:%2Ffastfood%2Fproduct-category%2Fburgers%2F|||" css=".vc_custom_1556010707952{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" general_row_align="lafka-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1556115076828{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background: #1e73be url(https://i0.wp.com/lafka.althemist.com/fastfood/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2019/04/parallax4.jpg?id=3612);background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1553869337189{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_icon type="flaticon" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" icon_flaticon="flaticon-027-donut" css=".vc_custom_1556114618491{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://i0.wp.com/lafka.althemist.com/fastfood/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2019/04/vintage-burst2-light.png?id=3186) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}" custom_background_color="#bf8f49"][vc_custom_heading text="TASTES GREAT" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:70|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1556114559274{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]
